lyrics:
5 contributors1980 lyricsintro steaknife danny boone

with your long brown sexy curls uh uh

verse 1 danny boone
alright son hold up
you need to slow your roll

she aint no ho
she got class style pizzazz a jazzy
smile as a matter of fact she has me
twisted just like she did back then when
the game of galaga played among friends
is all it was about
been at her every since

and i told her yo

chorus danny boone
listen up cause i love you lady

lord knows youre the one to change me
you love me cause im so crazy
youll see itll be you and me
always always
see rehab liveget tickets as low as 33you might also likeverse 2 danny boone

probably been telling you that

but we can do it by the book

and thats what got me hooked

you got some crazy homies
yo quit fronting and lolly gagging

maybe call her maggie
weve known each other since the 9th grade
we make each other laugh
best friends lets do this the right way

listen up cause i love you lady

lord knows youre the one to change me

youll see itll be you and me
always always
listen up cause i love you lady

lord knows youre the one to change me

verse 3 danny boone

and youre still hot
but if i aint the one

and if not im here when push comes to shove
just know if you walk down that aisle
with another dude to take those vows
how ill react there aint no telling
i might bust in the back of the church and start yelling
